reviewText: There was nothing not to like. This was a wonderful historical drama. Originally I got it at the library and liked it so much I bought it on Amazon for a friend.
A historical movie that is probably something you never knew.  I really liked it.
It was ok, but not as great as I thought it would be based on the excellent cast.  I will donate it to my local library and they will love it.
Tends to be long winded on the story.  Never finished watching.
Nice movie, will have to keep studying that particular history.

Hope I was the only idiot to buy this junk movie.
No pirates, No ships, no battles.
Just some Turkish guy living in Russia.
Total junk. I threw the movie in the trash!
